11 March, 2020. Although COVID-19 is not life-threatening in most people, it can be

articles.author: James Rodger, Emma Grimshaw
articles.title: Man who recklessly infected women with HIV is jailed - Bristol Post
articles.description: "You were prepared to play Russian roulette with your partners' health"
articles.content:
A man who 'recklessly' infected three women with HIV after playing 'Russian roulette' with their lives has been jailed for eight years.
